title: account transfer issues ( till when )
body:
i cant play the game like a week cuz riot decide they make a maintenance to their server in oce !! 
i move to another region  ( like physically  ) and i wanted to transfer my acc to eune  and still no eta on how long this gonna take !! 
some one knows ? 
mean while  the the season ending and i cant get the rewords i wanted !

replies.body: Welcome to my world this functionality is not working for years . . . Do not make any illusions it wont be available any time soon as they even deleted the functionality from the MENU itself

Hi Risé, the eta according to [this post](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/lWZeb0Wi-known-issue-oce-transfers-disabled) was that transfers would be back up on 8th Nov, and I can confirm that they are now available again.
Not working atm, tried transferring from NA to OCE 3 times, and everytime i can login back to NA with the same amount of RP as if i didn't use transfer at all.
